00085 void setup(){
00086    background(255,255,255);
00087    size(RESOLUTION[0],RESOLUTION[1]); //resolution
00088    frame.setResizable(true); //allows for full screen and resize
00089    
00090      //size(screen.width, screen.height, OPENGL); //for full screen and opengl
00091      //lights();
00092      noStroke();
00093 
00094    //frameRate(60); //uncomment to unrestrict the draw() function from being locked to 60 fps. 
00095    smooth(); //this is for AA - don't turn it off, makes things ugly and jaggy!
00096 
00097   font = loadFont("AgencyFB-Reg-48.vlw"); 
00098   textFont(font, 32); 
00099 
00100 
00101   println(port.list());
00102   port=new Serial(this,port.list()[2],9600);           //CHECK THIS - change to relevant serial port
00103   nunchukPort = new Serial(this, nunchukPort.list()[0],9600);
00104   serverSetup();
00105  
00106 /*
00107 EXAMPLE API:
00108 
00109 144,127,255,703422,4069684,239*
00110 6 values are passed before the '*' symbol.
00111 
00112 */
00113 }
